meanings.definition: To cause to draw near or adhere
meanings.sent2: The sweet smell attracts bees to the flowers.
meanings.sent3: The sticky tape attracts all the loose papers on the desk.
meanings.sent4: Her positive energy attracts people like a magnet.
meanings.sent5: The bright colors of the painting attract attention from across the room.

meanings.definition: To draw by appealing to the emotions or senses
meanings.sent1: The touching story attracts many readers.
meanings.sent2: The delicious aroma of the bakery attracts customers.
meanings.sent3: The cute puppy attracts smiles wherever it goes.
meanings.sent4: Her music attracts listeners like a magnet.
meanings.sent5: The warm fire in the fireplace attracts everyone on a cold night.

meanings.definition: To exert a force that draws something towards oneself
meanings.sent1: The strong gravitational pull attracts objects to the Earth.
meanings.sent2: The powerful vacuum cleaner attracts dust and dirt.
meanings.sent3: The big black hole attracts everything around it.
meanings.sent4: His charisma attracts opportunities towards him.
meanings.sent5: The powerful magnet attracts metal objects from a distance.
